title: Desi Lamb Tikka Burger
subtitle: A burger containing a juicy fat patty made of lamb served with tomatoes and lettue
steps: Mix the dry spices, chopped onions with minced meat
Make patties from the mixture
Dry the patties until both sides are well cooked
Cut tomatoes into circles
Take a bun, put lettuce leaves on it
Put two of the sliced tomatoes
Put the patty on the top of the tomatoes, repeat two layers above it
Put another bun on top
Your Desi Lamb Tikka burger is now ready!

title: Chicken Dum Biriyani
subtitle: A delicacy prepared in different parts of India with tender chicken pieces and aromatic long grain rice
steps: Fry the onions until they turn golden
Add the dry spices mentioned in the ingredients
Add chicken to the pan and fry for about 15 minutes
Keep the preparation aside
Boil the rice in a separate vessel for 30 minutes
Now take the vessel away from flame

Prepare layers of rice and chicken masala stacked on each other.Prepare layers of rice and chicken masala stacked on each other.Prepare layers of rice and chicken masala stacked on each other.Prepare layers of rice and chicken masala stacked on each other
Now seal the vessel with dough and cook for 20 mins
Your biriyani is now ready
